body:
Hey!

As you are probably aware we are rolling the Atlas Update but as any update it came with its cool features, plans for the future, missing features, and bugs.

In this thread the development team will log all the tackling of the two latest, features that we had that we removed, and our beloved bugs.

Regards,
The Avicus Network Development Team
body_tagged:

title: Atlas Zero-to-Hero Log

replies.body:
• Temporality disabled new Tablist.
  • Added credit dings.
  • Fixed a few permissions (work still needed here)

By disabling Tablist the lag should have been cut in a very notable way. Looking at metrics, this has indeed happened.

Please keep reporting issues here.
replies.body_tagged:
• Temporality disabled new Tablist.
  • Added credit dings.
  • Fixed a few permissions (work still needed here)

By disabling Tablist the lag should have been cut in a very notable way. Looking at metrics, this has indeed happened.

Please keep reporting issues here.

replies.body: • Fixed player names team color being wrong in objective completion messages. - Thanks Elly <3
replies.body_tagged: • Fixed player names team color being wrong in objective completion messages. - Thanks Elly <3

replies.body:
• Default credit sounds are back! You can still get custom credit sounds from the gadget store.
  • Credit rewards for winning/participating in a match are back.
replies.body_tagged:
• Default credit sounds are back! You can still get custom credit sounds from the gadget store.
  • Credit rewards for winning/participating in a match are back.

replies.body:
• /leave fixed
  • /join <team> fixed
  • Premium ranks have their proper match joining permissions
  • Dead players are no longer visible to spectators
  • Updated server list ping, shows online players
  • /friends is ordered properly
